cause.description:
September 22, 2007. The members of Phi Delta Theta Fraternity will be hosting a concert to which all proceeds be donated to the ALS Assocaition. Our goal is to not only help individuals and families with ALS, but host an event which will educate and entertain the University of Southern Indiana students and surrounding community.
1. Find a Cure
2. Raise Awareness
3. Create an event that USI will be known for
cause.mission: Help raise funds for ALS research that will provide needed services to patients and their families.
cause.name: September Smash
